description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Special State and Federal government funding sources often have restrictions about how they can be spent. The State and Federal Programs Office ensures that these funds are spent appropriately, and that programs are implemented in compliance with State and Federal requirements.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
